venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest -- Equestrian Parking Lot (#3)

item.description:
Join the park interpreter on a recreational hike each week into a different part of Myles Standish State Forest.  Each hike travels along different trails and is about 3 to 4 miles in length.  Join us for one hike or come for the whole series!  Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.  For adults and older children who can hike 3 to 4 miles of moderately difficult trails.  All children must be accompanied by an adult. We’ll meet in a different location each week: 

August 4th:  Meet Charge Pond Parking Lot #5. 

August 11th:   Meet at the Fire Tower Parking Lot #6. 

August 18th:  Meet at the East Entrance Parking Lot #4. 

August 25th:   Meet at the Equestrian Parking Lot #3. (follow sign pointing off Lower College Pond Road near the Barrett Pond campground.)

For a trail map, including parking lots, visit http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm. Rain cancels. Call the park office with questions at (508) 866-2526

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Off the beaten path hike series
